title: Game Progress Route
content:
th the "Roveer's Storehouse" and "Visit the Emperor's Old Hideout" quests will receive updates. Enter the secret Wine Passage in the basement to reach the old Hideput of the emperor.

From the Emperor's Hideout, access the Lower City Sewers through the hatch. There, you'll encounter a bloodied Gale who warns you to distance yourself from a particular "monster." Reply with:

What monster are you referring to? Gale, you're injured. What happened to you? Why are you here in the sewers? Whatever you
